    Lionel Hertzog, PhD

    Ecologist / Data geek

    Welcome to my professional website I hope that youâ€™ll find it helpful.

    A few words about me:

    I am currently employed as a PostDoc by the university of Ghent working partly at TEREC and partly at ForNaLab within the TREEWEB.

    Before that I did my PhD at the Technical University of Munich with the Terrestrial ecology group and working on how plant diversity affect arthropod communities and the ecosystem functions that they perform. This was done within the framework of the Jena experiement, you can find the results from these 4 years of work at the mediaTUM website.
